item.title: Don't Understand Why Its not working
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Source: Delta

I am trying to make something where your player moves when an npc is inside of you I get no errors but it doesn’t work here’s the codes I put in:

In the NPCHANDLER under the method public boolean AttackPlayer(int NPCID) {

I put this:

if(npcs[NPCID].absX == plr.absX && npcs[NPCID].absY == plr.absY) { playerMove(0, 1); }

In the Client I have this for my player moving:

[code]public void playerMove(int i, int j) {
Player.newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
if(++Player.newWalkCmdSteps > 50)
Player.newWalkCmdSteps = 0;
int k = absX + i;
k -= mapRegionX * 8;
Player.newWalkCmdX[0] = Player.newWalkCmdY[0] =

Player.tmpNWCX[0] = Player.tmpNWCY[0] = 0;
int l = absY + j;
l -= mapRegionY * 8;
isRunning2 = false;
isRunning = false;
for(i = 0; i < Player.newWalkCmdSteps; i++) {
Player.newWalkCmdX[i] += k;
Player.newWalkCmdY[i] += l;
}
lastWalk = System.currentTimeMillis();
walkDelay = 1;
poimiY = l;
poimiX = k;
}[/code]

I really am not sure why its not working, can someone help?

Read full topic
item.source: Don't Understand Why Its not working
